there's so much to love about Hong Kong
the bright lights the tasty dishes the
crazy skyline and the busy streets but
if there's one thing not to like it
would be the insane prices for eight
years in a row Hong Kong has been ranked
as having the world's most expensive
housing and real estate a short supply
of land with a growing population
surpassing eight million people has
caused property prices to be at an
all-time high
more than new york city more than london
and more than tokyo so just to

rent is in Hong Kong

our hotel situation represents a brutal
living conditions that all residents of

gonna get worse a room like ours is
often shared by a family of five because
it cannot afford anything bigger
buildings will keep getting taller to
